Text:
AWFUL movie. Guy is buried alive, calls on his cell, they try to find him, and think did just before his air runs out, except... they're at the wrong spot! And he dies!! Filmed *entirely* in the coffin. WOrst movie to come out in many years. The fact that it gets a decent rating on IMDb just shows how gullible and stupid most people are.

Sorry, i have never posted a spoiler before, but this movie was so bad it made me want to punch someone. I'm just glad i didn't pay to see it.

This was a very good movie, and shame on the other poster for hating the unhappy ending so much that he went around to every torrent he could find of it and give it a spoiler. Don't let his bad sportsmanship ruin your experience.
